1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Message
4  ( -- * Abortable
5    abClause,
6    -- * Message
7    dupPrefix,
8    dupReplacement,
9    httpError,
10    invalidPrefix,
11    noFile,
12    sameIOPoints,
13    unkClause,
14    unresPrefix,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base as B
18
19abClause :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.Map (B.Ab b)
20abClause = B.abortable "clause"
21
22-- | Duplicate prefix
23dupPrefix :: [String] -> B.Ab a
24dupPrefix = Left . B.abortLine "Duplicate prefix" . unwords
25
26-- | Duplicate replacement
27dupReplacement :: [String] -> B.Ab a
28dupReplacement = Left . B.abortLine "Duplicate replacement" . unwords
29
30-- | HTTP Error
31httpError :: String -> Int -> String -> B.Ab a
32httpError url code msg = Left $ B.abortLines "HTTP Error" detail where
33    detail | code == 0  = [msg, url]
34           | otherwise  = [show code ++ " " ++ msg, url]
35
36-- | Invalid prefix character
37invalidPrefix :: [String] -> B.Ab a
38invalidPrefix = Left . B.abortLine "Invalid prefix character" . unwords
39
40-- | File not found
41noFile :: FilePath -> String -> B.Ab a
42noFile "" path = Left $ B.abortLine "File not found" path
43noFile cd path = Left $ B.abortLines "File not found" [path, "directory: " ++ cd]
44
45-- | Same I/O points
46sameIOPoints :: B.IOPoint -> B.Ab a
47sameIOPoints = Left . B.abortLine "Same I/O points" . B.ioPointText
48
49-- | Unknown clause
50unkClause :: [String] -> B.Ab a
51unkClause = Left . B.abortLines "Unknown clause"
52
53-- | Unresolved prefix
54unresPrefix :: String -> B.Ab a
55unresPrefix pre = Left $ B.abortLine "Unresolved prefix"
56                       $ "Require short definition : short " ++ pre ++ " ..."
